TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EasingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines the modes in which classes derived from perform their easing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The following graphs demonstrate the different values of , where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time. ![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.") ![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CircleEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.") ![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.") ![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes") ![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseIn = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseInOut = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Interpolation uses for the first half of the animation and for the second half.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseOut = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
